headline: Wolfspeed nears bankruptcy deal with lenders including Apollo, Bloomberg News reports
summary: The company will soon announce a deal for a so-called prepackaged bankruptcy, that would be long enough to slash billions in debt, the report said.  After a restructuring support agreement is signed, Wolfspeed will ask creditors to vote on the plan and then file for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection.  Shares of Wolfspeed, which makes chips using silicon carbide — a more energy-efficient material than traditional silicon, rose about 3% to $1.29 on Wednesday.

headline: Mosaicx Launches AI-Native CX Platform and Wins Top Honor at CCW Las Vegas 2025
summary: Recognized for innovation and inclusion, Mosaicx debuts next-generation Engage platform and earns Best Workplace for Gender Equity AwardOMAHA, Neb., June 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mosaicx, a leader in AI-powered customer experience solutions and part of WestCX under the West Technology Group portfolio, made a major impact at this year’s Customer Contact Week (CCW) in Las Vegas.
